smoothness_description: Significant stutter and lag - below industry standards
summary: Overall scroll smoothness: Poor - Significant stutter and lag - below industry standards. Activity score: 20.51 (content movement level), Jerkiness: 15.56 (motion consistency, lower is better), Frame-time jitter: 3.71 ms (timing stability, target < 8ms for smooth), Estimated FPS: 11.9 (target: 60 FPS).
issues: High jerkiness (15.56): Scrolling motion is very uneven and jerky.
Low frame rate (estimated 11.9 FPS): Below optimal 60 FPS target.
